betaComponents.name: accordion
betaComponents.description: Collapse display a list of high-level options that can expand/collapse to reveal more information.

betaComponents.name: alert
betaComponents.description: Alerts are temporary notifications that provide concise feedback about an action or event.

betaComponents.name: autocomplete
betaComponents.description: An autocomplete combines a text input with a listbox, allowing users to filter a list of options to items matching a query.

betaComponents.name: avatar
betaComponents.description: The Avatar component is used to represent a user, and displays the profile picture, initials or fallback icon.

betaComponents.name: badge
betaComponents.description: Badges are used as a small numerical value or status descriptor for UI elements.

betaComponents.name: breadcrumbs
betaComponents.description: Breadcrumbs display a hierarchy of links to the current page or resource in an application.

betaComponents.name: button
betaComponents.description: Buttons allow users to perform actions and choose with a single tap.

betaComponents.name: calendar
betaComponents.description: A calendar displays one or more date grids and allows users to select a single date.

betaComponents.name: card
betaComponents.description: Card is a container for text, photos, and actions in the context of a single subject.

betaComponents.name: checkbox
betaComponents.description: Checkboxes allow users to select multiple items from a list of individual items, or to mark one individual item as selected.

betaComponents.name: chip
betaComponents.description: Chips help people enter information, make selections, filter content, or trigger actions.

betaComponents.name: code
betaComponents.description: Code is a component used to display inline code.

betaComponents.name: date-input
betaComponents.description: A date input allows users to enter and edit date and time values using a keyboard.

betaComponents.name: date-picker
betaComponents.description: A date picker combines a DateInput and a Calendar popover to allow users to enter or select a date and time value.

betaComponents.name: divider
betaComponents.description: . A separator is a visual divider between two groups of content

betaComponents.name: drawer
betaComponents.description: Used to render a content that slides in from the side of the screen.

betaComponents.name: dropdown
betaComponents.description: A dropdown displays a list of actions or options that a user can choose.

betaComponents.name: form
betaComponents.description: A form is a group of inputs that allows users submit data to a server and supports field validation errors.

betaComponents.name: image
betaComponents.description: A simple image component

betaComponents.name: input
betaComponents.description: The input component is designed for capturing user input within a text field.

betaComponents.name: kbd
betaComponents.description: The keyboard key components indicates which key or set of keys used to execute a specificv  action

betaComponents.name: link
betaComponents.description: Links allow users to click their way from page to page. This component is styled to resemble a hyperlink and semantically renders an <a>

betaComponents.name: listbox
betaComponents.description: A listbox displays a list of options and allows a user to select one or more of them.

betaComponents.name: menu
betaComponents.description: A menu displays a list of options and allows a user to select one or more of them.

betaComponents.name: modal
betaComponents.description: Displays a dialog with a custom content that requires attention or provides additional information.

betaComponents.name: navbar
betaComponents.description: A responsive navigation header positioned on top side of your page that includes support for branding, links, navigation, collapse and more.

betaComponents.name: pagination
betaComponents.description: The Pagination component allows you to display active page and navigate between multiple pages.

betaComponents.name: popover
betaComponents.description: A popover is an overlay element positioned relative to a trigger.

betaComponents.name: progress
betaComponents.description: Progress bars show either determinate or indeterminate progress of an operation over time.

betaComponents.name: radio
betaComponents.description: Radios allow users to select a single option from a list of mutually exclusive options.

betaComponents.name: ripple
betaComponents.description: A simple implementation to display a ripple animation when the source component is clicked

betaComponents.name: scroll-shadow
betaComponents.description: A component that applies top and bottom shadows when content overflows on scroll.

betaComponents.name: select
betaComponents.description: A select displays a collapsible list of options and allows a user to select one of them.

betaComponents.name: skeleton
betaComponents.description: Skeleton is used to display the loading state of some component.

betaComponents.name: slider
betaComponents.description: A slider allows a user to select one or more values within a range.

betaComponents.name: snippet
betaComponents.description: Display a snippet of copyable code for the command line.

betaComponents.name: spacer
betaComponents.description: A flexible spacer component designed to create consistent spacing and maintain alignment in your layout.

betaComponents.name: spinner
betaComponents.description: Loaders express an unspecified wait time or display the length of a process.

betaComponents.name: switch
betaComponents.description: A switch is similar to a checkbox, but represents on/off values as opposed to selection.

betaComponents.name: table
betaComponents.description: Tables are used to display tabular data using rows and columns.

betaComponents.name: tabs
betaComponents.description: Tabs organize content into multiple sections and allow users to navigate between them.

betaComponents.name: tooltip
betaComponents.description: A React Component for rendering dynamically positioned Tooltips

betaComponents.name: user
betaComponents.description: Flexible User Profile Component.
